text: Odon was a town of ancient Lydia, inhabited during Hellenistic and Roman times. Its name does not occur among ancient authors, but is inferred from epigraphic and other evidence. Its site is located near Selekler, Borlu in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Lydia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Manisa Province
title: Odon (Lydia)
